Text.Page:
The argons already enjoy a great advantage in numbers, but when those damned akalaths take the field, they brutalize our forces.

You've got a better record than most against them. Head out and kill some akalath devastators. I can't afford to lose whole formations to their power.
Well fought, <PCNAME>. If I live to my next furlough, I'll buy you a barrel of Kaiator's best ale!
